name: The Watchers (itch) (fendercodes)
description:
The Watchers is a haunting co-op puzzle game in which two players take control of a brother and sister trying to uncover the truth behind their mother’s disappearance. Explore the sinister compound of a local cult and work together to tackle brutal puzzles. But be careful. You’re being watched.

Demo

You can download the demo for free on Itch.io. It contains the first 3 cursed objects, which is a decent length of the game. 

The full game will be released on January 23rd 2020 and contains all 10 cursed objects. Please support us by adding The Watchers to your Steam Wishlist:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1112830/The_Watchers/

Story

There’s a half-forgotten structure hidden in the hills of the Coyote Valley and twins Luisa and Frederico Puerta aren’t leaving until they find out what happened there 15 years ago. After their estranged mother Anna succeeded there as leader of The Watchers of Azazel, everything changed. The flames were seen by a local farmer, the screams heard by a passing hiker, the blood seen by noone. What happened to the cult’s members? Where is Anna Peurta?

Features
  • Online co-op gameplay:
    Two players (no more, no less) will take control of fully-voiced characters, Luisa and Frederico, in this unique online co-op gaming experience. Bring a friend, or find someone to play with using the server browser. Microphone voice chat is built-in as communication is vital for survival.
  • Challenging puzzles:
    To solve the mystery of Anna Puerta's disappearance, you'll need strong teamwork and navigation skills to gather objects and successfully evade enemies.
  • Horror atmosphere:
    Be prepared for a quietly chilling setting, but note that there are no jump scares in this game. 
  • Unique environment:
    Explore The Watchers' cult headquarters to reveal disturbing truths.
  • Original soundtrack:
    Haunting original score from established British composer, Peter Fender.
